name.title: Name
name.description: A nickname for the Pilight instance

host.title: Hostname
host.description: The hostname or ip to Pilight web socket, default: 127.0.0.1

port.title: Port
port.description: The port to Pilight web socket, default: 5001

messageInterval.title: Send message interval
messageInterval.description: The time (in milliseconds) between messages sent to the websocket. This is to prevent message spamming to the websocket causing signals not coming through to the actual devices. Default: 400 (ms)

retryInterval.title: Re-connect interval
retryInterval.description: The time (in seconds) between retry attempts to connect to the web socket. Default: 10 (seconds)
